رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا ٣٧ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ صَفّٗاۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابٗا ٣٨ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مََٔابًا ٣٩ إِنَّآ أَنذَرۡنَٰكُمۡ عَذَابٗا قَرِيبٗا يَوۡمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَٰبَۢا ٤٠ (37) ohu ahas ha mihithalaye da ee deka athara athi dahi da paramadhipathiyaya.

maduru mardanayata sahayaka kramawedayak wana ghana bi.ti.ayi. baktiriyawa bhawitha kirime niyamu wyapruthiya agosthu masayedi aarambha kirimata saukhya amathyanshaya thiranaya kara atha.maduruwan athulu wenath krumin mardanaya kirima sandaha sidu karana dumayanayen saha kruminashaka yedimen parisarayatatha්, parisara hithakami wenath krumintath balawath hani sidu wana bawa paryeshanawalin thahawuru wimath samanga me wikalpa kramawedaya bhawitha kirimata amathyanshaye awadhanaya yomu wi thibe.boralasgamuwa, gampaha, kalaniya saukhya waidya niladhari kottasawala prathamayenma me niyamu wyapruthiya kriyathmaka kere.maduru mardanaya sandaha kruminashaka bhawitha kirima wenuwata parisarayata ha anekuth kruminta hani nowana aakaraye rasayanikayak bhawitha kirime kramawedayak lesa me bi.ti.ayi. baktiriyawa bhawitha kere.

upasthayakayanta upades 8 ese ma, upasthayakayan sansun, diwa deke katha nathi, pamana ikmawa mathpan panaya nokarana, ayuthu labhayata lol no wu, 9 adahille abirahasa pirisidu hrudaya sakshiyakin darana thanaththan wiya yuthu ya. 10 upasthayakayan lesa sewaya kirimata ida diya yuththe, kalin sodisi kara bala, owunta wiruddha wa kisiwak nomathi ayata pamani. 11 ese ma sthriwarun da, gaurawaya labimata sudusu wu, oopadupa nokiyana, thanpath, wishwasa katayuthu aya wiya yuthu ya. 12 upasthayakaya eka bharyawak athi purushayeku da, siya darupawula manawin rakabalaganna wu da thanaththeku wiya yuthu ya. 13 yahapath lesa sewaya kara, usas thaththwayak labaganna upasthayakayanta, kristhus jesus wahanse kerehi wu adahilla thulin mahath nirbhithakamak laba ganimata puluwan weyi.
